fns-with-duplicated-code.name: "with a matching entry in the user's crontab"::"should not break with variables that match the cron resource internals"
"with a matching entry in the user's crontab"::"should not break with variabels that match the cron resource internals"
"with a matching entry without a crontab line"::"should set cron_exists and leave current_resource values at defaults"
"with a matching entry without a crontab line"::"should not pick up a commented out crontab line"
"with a matching entry without a crontab line"::"should not pick up a later crontab entry"
"when there is no existing crontab"::"should include env variables that are set"
"when there is a crontab with no matching section"::"should include env variables that are set"
"when there is a crontab with a matching but different section"::"should include env variables that are set"

details.longest-fn-loc-name: "when there is a crontab with a matching section with no crontab line in it"::"should handle env vars with no crontab"

fn-args.max-arg-name: "should raise an exception if the command die's and parent tries to write"

details.cc-max-name: "should raise an exception if the command die's and parent tries to write"
